7
We suggest the following names of discussants for
any future meetings planned to consider the above problems:
1. R. C. Higgy—Director WOSU
Area; Recording quality and other engineering
aspects of the Network.
2. W. H. Ewing—-Program Supervisor, WOSU
Area: Talks and other NAEB programs.
3. James Cain—Program Assistant, WOSU, in charge
of music planning and founder of Prestige Concerts.
Area: Music
4. Margaret Tylerr-Director, Ohio School of the Air.
Area; In school and other youth broadcasts.
5. Alfred Garrett—Professor of Chemistry.
Area: Science
6. Andrew Hendriekson—Professor, Bureau of Special
and Adult Education.
Area: Adult Education Needs
7. Newton Rochte—Assistant Program Supervisor, WOSU,
and instructor in Bureau of Special and Adult Education
Area: Radio programming for adult Education needs
8. Max Goodson—Assistant Dean and Coordinator of Research
and Service, College of Education: staff member at
National Training Laboratory, Bethel Maine.
Area: Group and leadership training.
